Silence::

She sighed and wanted to figure out a solution for her new found
friends, but it wasn't easy when half your brain was still in termal
stasis mode. 
"Perhaps he's just down for an overhaul. If he's actually in a repair
bay, he might be vulnerable. We could launch an attack while he's
down. OR better yet, infiltrate and set his self destruct mode off and
we could made out escape before he blows."    She didn't even know she
was breathing hard untill she finished and notice her body was acting
like she had just flown across the planet and back.  She recomposed
herself and looked up at him, with some hope he might have actually
liked her ideas.

> Rodimus:
>

I guess that he's re-organizing all and waitting what will happen... I
can't imagine what will be next"
